result.title: C18-C22 monounsaturated FA samples
result.description: These fractions are obtained as a result of the oil enrichment through short path distillation, cold precipitation, molecular distillation, and other separation technologies as SFE/SCE or bio-enzymatical techniques. After this enrichment and apart from the monounsaturated fractions, PUFAS will be also obtained, which will be subsequently fractionated. A report showing the conclusions of the fractionation will also be delivered.

result.title: White paper on CCU realisation and perception, with a focus on COZMOS' technology
result.description: The report will summarize the key aspects of TEAs and LCAs developed in WP4 and will aim at communicating the main insights of the studies to a non-technical audience with particular focus on policy maker audience. The content and the format of the white paper shall be agreed by the whole consortium and contain clear and rigorous statements (supported by verifiable data) on the conditions and circumstances (geographical, techno-economical etc.) under which the CCU, in general and COZMOS process in particular, represent a sustainable route to the overall reduction of carbon emissions. Refers to Task 5.4

result.title: Final Report: Social and policy assessment of the COSMOS value chains
result.description: Final Report: Social and policy assessment of the COSMOS value chains. The report includes all defintitions and settings specific to the social and policy assessment, the methodology used to perform the social and policy assessment, as well as all findings. The latter include all results as well as conclusions and recommendations.

result.title: Large-scale fields and growing guidelines for each crop
result.description: Large-scale fields of 5-10 hectares will be established in Greece, Italy and Poland for each crop to assess the adaptability and workability of existing farm machines commonly used for oilseed crops, estimate the labour demand, assess the economic and environmental impacts, measure the actual biomass and oil yields, and yield gap, verify operational feasibility under real farm conditions, identify problems and come up with solutions. This deliverable is linked to Task 3.6.
